title: Our clothes
creator_credit: Bengt Almberg, Almberg Films and Boulton-Hawker Films
brief_description: Discusses clothing needs and illustrates the whole range of processes in their manufacture both in the home and the factory. Also introduces the production of man-made fibres. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Bengt Almberg, Almberg Films and Boulton-Hawker Films
